title: Ivory Boota Tunic
body_html: Equal part crisp and comfortable, this ivory cotton kurta and pants set is a winner of a pick to elevate your work-from-home looks. The boota-printed kurta features piping details, a round neck and short sleeves. It is coordinated with a pair of boota-printed narrow tapered pants.<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">Style Tip: Take the look outdoors with a pair of Kolhapuri chappals.
